thread.title: Titles and synopses released for The Walking Dead episodes | moviepilot.com
thread.title_full: Titles and synopses released for The Walking Dead episodes | moviepilot.com

author: Allanah Faherty
title: Titles and synopses released for The Walking Dead episodes | moviepilot.com
text:
Episode 11 — "Hostiles and Calamities" 
An Alexandrian discovers they must navigate the mysterious, confusing and terrifying world within the Saviors' compound. 
Following the release of the most recent promo for Season 7b, it seems a decent guess to say that Episode 11 will be a mainly Saviors-based episode and probably revolved around Eugene being put to work by Negan and his men. Eugene at the base [Credit: AMC] Episode 12 — "Say Yes" 
The group scavenges for supplies; back in Alexandria, someone must make a morally challenging decision. 
Despite all the goings on it looks like scavenging for supplies is still one of the main dramas of being an apocalypse survivor, especially when you're still supposed to give up 50% of your haul to a vicious overlord! The Alexandria plot will also be very intriguing, over the past seven seasons there have been many moments which have morally challenged the team — can't wait to find out what happens here. Episode 13 — "Bury Me Here" 
Things do not go as planned when a group of Kingdommers delivers goods to the Saviors during a routine supply drop-off. 
It looks like Episode 13 might be somewhat of a blood bath, given that a supply drop off with the Saviors going awry usually results in violence. While it's still three episodes before the season finale, Episode 13 could well be the episode which kicks the season into high gear before what is, hopefully, a dramatic finale. 
If you're a Walking Dead super fan, be sure to check out "Becoming: A Zombie from The Walking Dead," where Chris Villain, a cosplay super star, will transform himself and become a zombie from The Walking Dead. You can catch it live on Super News By Movie Pilot at Thursday 1pm PST 
The Walking Dead returns with Episode 9, "Rock in the Road" on February 12. Poll What episode sounds the most promising to you? Episode 9 — "Rock in the Road" Episode 10 — "New Best Friends" Episode 11 — "Hostiles and Calamities" Episode 12 — "Say Yes"
